byLineInfo.name: Visit the Fruit of the Loom Store

features: Care instructions Machine wash cold with like colors. Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low. Do not iron
This is an assorted color pack. This pack may contain all solids, all prints or a combination. Prints and color may vary.
Supersoft, premium cotton blend fabric with high performance stretch that moves with you
Stretchy elastic at waist & leg that won't roll, dig or pinch
Flat side seams that stretch with you
body.description: Fruit of the Loom's 360 Stretch Comfort Panties are the perfect addition to your underwear drawer. This super soft, premium cotton triblend fabric has added stretch that moves with you. It also features a stretchy elastic waistband that wont roll, dig, or pinch. Plus it stays in place. The triblend fabric makes these panties not only reliable but ideal for every day wear. These panties are designed for effortless comfort, so stock up now! As always, Fruit of the Loom panties are tag-free and made with a 100% cotton liner for extra comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are so comfortable! Love these!
reviews.reviewText: These undies are so comfortable. The quality and the fit are excellent. (The colors are probably unpredictable — I got burgundy, charcoal and salmon. I don’t care about the colors, I am mainly concerned about the comfort, quality and fit, which are excellent. My pant size is 12 or 14, and I got these undies in size 9 — size 9 is a perfect fit. I love the fabric blend — very breathable and comfortable. I got the cotton blend bikinis (cotton and spandex). I should mention that the “bikini” is a full cut. At first I ordered the hipsters because I didn’t want low-cut undies. But the hipsters came up to my waist, too much like granny panties. So I ordered the bikinis, and they do provide full coverage.The stretch of the fabric is very nice, and the elastic around the waistband and legs is very comfortable. These cotton blend undies are breathable and comfortable. They fit smoothly and don’t show panty lines through your clothes.I immediately ordered another set, and I will order more. They were on sale for $9.99 for a pack of six. That’s a really good value. It can be hard to find underwear that meet all the requirements, and these check all the boxes for me. I will order more, so that I don’t have to go on another underwear expedition anytime soon. Thanks, Fruit of the Loom, for these quality, comfy undies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and Comfortable to wear!!!
reviews.reviewText: These are the most comfortable and fun plus size shorts to wear around the house on any occasion, now that's how comfortable they are. I enjoy wearing them especially for lounging or sleeping in them. They don't ride up, and they are the prefect length and fit. I guess that's why they are effectless because of the way they have a nice stretch to them and are not too tight. They are very breathable, so I don't sweat in them because they keep me feeling cool. Around the elastic band it bends a little, and the white shorts are see through, so I gave them to someone that's why they are not in the picture. I highly recommend these comfortable shorts because they have the best stretch and fun colors to wear!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these hoping they would work out and the price was very good compared to other styles of the same brand. I was pleasantly surprised! I think these are the most comfortable underwear I have tried so far. I usually prefer 100% cotton and these are a 60/40 but it actually makes them more comfortable. They don't shrink at all so the fit is more true to size. They feel somewhat smooth and silky and there are less pantyline issues. They have some stretch which adds to the comfort level and the elastic around the legs does not dig in or cause irritation. Great buy for the money. I do wish there were more lighter colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The only underwear I wear now. Have gotten multiple packs. Some threads have come loose, and one pair the elastic has worn. I've started washing them in a laundry bag. But I fell in love with the comfort of the material, and fit. Does not ride up, does not feel stuffy. True to size. It has a different material in the privates area so a pad/liner sticks well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for everyday underwear needs!
reviews.reviewText: It’s comfy, durable, & soft to boot if you want to have these as you go-out underwear.The only three cons are the elastic isn’t very stretchable especially around the leg region ( You probably have to carefully stretch it out around the leg holes or wait after a few washes so it will not pinch so much). The waist band is too short so if you want a longer width of a band, look elsewhere. And, the material of the underwear feels very thin and not thick as I wanted. Probably not good for the cold weather but perfect for the hot and sunny weather.Besides the cons, I recommend these as part of your essential underwear attire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice unders at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Great price, comfortable, fit well. I prefer unders that sit a bit higher, like a french-cut, but it's hard to find that style at a reasonable price. These are flattering and fit me well. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin Fabric - Barely Consider It Cotton
reviews.reviewText: This underwear fabric seems thin. It reminds me of nylon underwear my mother wore. Although I'm sure there must be cotton blended in, it is difficult to recognize that fact. If you prefer nylon underwear, then you should be ok with these, but any true cotton lover will not.I would recommend checking out the differences in the styles and fabrics in a store where you can see and touch the fabric for yourself. Online purchases of clothing items are tough and this package of underwear is expensive. I would rather pay more at a regular store and get what I know I would like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The ladies underwear is strong durable and comfortable. They wear well. They are made of slightly stretchable material if needed. Highly recommend these
Really good Skims dupe. I find these more breathable and comfortable and you can't beat the price! I have bought a few packs and its all I wear to bed
Tissus très doux, élastique et respirant. On ne sent pas la couture ni l'élastique. Je recommande ce produit suite a une césarienne.

After ordering and returning several different types of underwear, finally found the right one! These are it!They are stretchy and comfortable, good coverage on the bum area, the crotch area is 100% cotton. Because the rest of the fabric is mixed, they dry quickly if you get sweaty. They don't roll down, very comfortable, I don't feel them on. I ordered the dark mixed bikini. The colors that came were better than the ones shown on the pic. I got 2 dark wine red, 2 dark dust rose and 2 dark gray. Love them! Ordered another pack. I hope to get the same colors as my first order.True to size in my case. They are stretchy, so easy to form to the body. Best every day underwear!
Me encantaron son de algodón y se quedan en su lugar no se hace rollizo, además son muy cómodos excelente compra
